long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of seeing old results in your searches. This extension enables the filter "Past Year" in your Google Searches. All your searches show only results from past one year by default. 

This is useful if you search a lot for tutorials, deals, coupons.
Since the filter is visible in the results you can fine tune it by changing it to month or week etc.

You can always change the setting in the results to show all anytime.
